comments.body:
I've opened a PR to include the license file in the source distribution upstream (https://github.com/jbogaardt/xlcompose/pull/7). Please add the following comment:

```yaml
# License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/jbogaardt/xlcompose/pull/7
license_file: LICENSE
...
```

This will be a reminder to check whether the file is included in future releases. When it is, you should remove this comment and the manually packaged copy.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See https://github.com/jbogaardt/xlcompose/pull/7
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
